summary: Open represents a mindset of embracing diversity, innovation, and unconventional thinking. It encompasses the idea of keeping the web weird by promoting open-source principles, digital fabrication, and user-driven creativity. This concept extends beyond technology, encouraging open perspectives in discussions and valuing differences. It fosters unity through shared visions while appreciating diverse viewpoints. The open approach champions digital ownership, internet freedom, and inclusive dialogues, ultimately creating a more diverse and innovative ecosystem both online and offline.
excerpt: Embrace openness in technology and mindset. Keep the web weird through open-source, digital fabrication, and creativity. Value differences by sharing visions, fostering empathy, and engaging in meaningful dialogues. Champion diversity and innovation in digital and real-world spaces.
